overview: A Vietnamese woman from an ethnic minority is grieving over the death of her husband caused by the U.S. bomb. An American fighter pilot is shot down and desperately trying to survive under the U.S. bombing in the jungle where the woman lives.

production_companies.name: Xưởng Phim Tổng Hợp Thành Phố Hồ Chí Minh

title: Left Alone
